document.full_text: mobile phone maker sony ericsson said on thursday the massive earthquake and tsunami in japan would disrupt its supply chain and that it was looking at measures to compensate.
document.title: sony ericsson sees supply chain disruption after quake
lines_and_colors: mobile phone maker sony ericsson said on thursday the massive earthquake and tsunami in japan would disrupt its supply chain and that it was looking at measures to compensate.
